birthday.name: birthday
birthday.title: Birthday Party
birthday.start_text: Our overlord is turning 231 and we want to offer a fabulous variety of food and booze. Can you get us some really interesting stuff to amuse the overlord?

outcomes.name: success
outcomes.end_text: Our overlord only ate 3 of our kind. Thank you for your help. Here, this is our famous choco latte. Legend says you should drink it with hot water.

outcomes.name: failure
outcomes.end_text: You return a little bit late and can't find the minion that gave you the quest. Asking around, no one seems to want to talk about it. Eventually you find a grumpy old man that tells you that all the minions have been eaten by the overlord, so don't bother looking for them. Yikes.
